events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their car and filed a formal claim to begin the process.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in vehicle accident claims was assigned to manage and process this claim.
The customer received acknowledgment of the claim and was informed about the next steps shortly.
We requested the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the customer.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documentation, including the police report and repair quotes.
Our team began the investigation to verify the details of the collision and assess liability.
The vehicle damage and accident circumstances have been fully investigated and documented.
A fair settlement was proposed to cover the repairs and any associated expenses from the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and proposed settlement offer.
Management approved the claim allowing us to proceed with issuing payment to the customer.
Payment was issued successfully to the customerâ€™s nominated bank account for vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed following payment disbursement and confirmation of repair completion.
The full claim file was archived securely for record retention and future reference if needed.
